action.action-desc: Mr. Buchanan (for himself, Mr. Yoho, and Mr. Soto) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To make daylight savings time permanent for the State of Florida, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Sunshine State Act.

section.header: Making daylight savings time permanent for the State of Florida
section.text: Section 3 of the Uniform Time Act of 1966 (15 U.S.C. 260a) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Permanent advancement of time for the State of Florida

paragraph.text: The standard time of the State of Florida shall be Coordinated Universal Time (as defined in section 1 of the Act of March 19, 1918 (commonly known as the Calder Act) (15 U.S.C. 261)) retarded by 4 hours.
Subsection (a) shall not apply to the State of Florida.
